110 inline int CInteractiveShapeBase::GetKeysState() const
111 {
112  ISelectable* selectablePtr = dynamic_cast<ISelectable*>(GetDisplayPtr());
113  if (selectablePtr != NULL){
114  return selectablePtr->GetKeysState();
115  }
116  else{
117  return 0;
118  }
119 }
120 
121 
122 inline int CInteractiveShapeBase::GetEditMode() const
123 {
124  ISelectable* selectablePtr = dynamic_cast<ISelectable*>(GetDisplayPtr());
125  if (selectablePtr != NULL){
126  return selectablePtr->GetEditMode();
127  }
128  else{
129  return ISelectable::EM_NONE;
130  }
131 }

136 inline int CInteractiveShapeBase::GetDisplayChangesMask()

139 }
